article_title: Erlanger retirees feel the knife: Latest cost-cutting move triples their health insurance premiums

article_metadata.description: Since he took the helm of Erlanger Health System in April, new CEO Kevin Spiegel has called for a series of cost-cutting measures that mean changes for employees.
